Headline: Pink Line Service Delayed at Kedzie
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are standing in the area of Kedzie due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are standing in the area of Kedzie due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
